verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Summon your power oh God
Show forth your strength as you have done before (repeat)
Oh God, oh God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
the chariots of God are tens of thousands (women)
and thousands of thousands (men) (repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Arise oh God and speak your word
and all your enemies will scatter
The sound of war shall soon be heard
A shout, your warriors shall answer
